title: Strange lag. Need help
body: Been getting lag lately that I haven't experienced on any game. I have tried reinstalling league and repairing the client. Just looking for other ideas to fix this.

replies.body:
Thanks for the video! Makes it pretty helpful to see what you're experiencing.

Since your ping and FPS doesn't change at all, I'd say this is likely a result of packet loss.  Dropped packets = client can't update your position = everything skips around.

I'd recommend going through our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Guide (particularly the wired vs. wireless connection).  Lemme know if this helps!
Been having the same issues. Riot isn't saying anything about it.

I've also been experiencing packet loss during my games, however i was hesitant to report it because i play on a wifi and my ping fluctuates between 30-50 and 100-200 at peek times.

The experience for me is exactly as show in the video regardless of my ping, and extreme packet loss also results in a brief disconnect.
